verbs.description: [V: According] to the latest news , Donald Trump has added yet another attorney to his legal team . And that attorney is none other than Rudy Giuliani . Per MSNBC
According to the latest news , Donald Trump [V: has] added yet another attorney to his legal team . And that attorney is none other than Rudy Giuliani . Per MSNBC
[ARGM-ADV: According to the latest news] , [ARG0: Donald Trump] has [V: added] [ARG1: yet another attorney] [ARG2: to his legal team] . And that attorney is none other than Rudy Giuliani . Per MSNBC
